Embraer 135/145 ADS-B Out STC by New United Goderich
Strengthen your pilot's situational awareness, streamline communication between your aircraft and Air Traffic Control, and keep your aircraft properly spaced in high-density traffic areas with New United Goderich's ADS-B Out STC # ST03177NY for Embraer 135/145 aircrafts.
This upgrade incorporates Honeywell’s RCZ-8XXM Mode S Extended Squitter transponders and FreeFlight Systems’ 1203C SBAS/GNSS sensor for a complete ADS-B (Out) solution, that utilizes a streamlined, simple design to minimize installation aircraft down time - the amendment requires no additional flight testing.
And you can also choose between performing full installation at New United Goderich facility or the acquisition of partial Installation Kits for the ADS-B (OUT) STC. Partial Installation Kits contain:
- Freeflight 1203C SBAS(WAAS) GPS Receiver/Antenna
- Supporting Wiring Diagrams
- Installation Engineering Orders
- Instructions for guiding a client through the Honeywell Primus II upgrade process (RMUs/ICUs, Strap Modules, etc.)
- Technical Support for installation and post install
- All “new” component installation parts
Contact New United Goderich to upgrade your Embraer 135/145 today!
